items.title: UpScrolled’s founder says the social network has zoomed past 2.5M users
items.description: Upscrolled founder said that the social network was launched six years ago and had 150,000 users until January

items.title: Carbon Robotics built an AI model that detects and identifies plants
items.description: Carbon Robotics' Large Plant Model will allow farmers to kill new types of weeds without having to retrain the machines.

items.title: Linq raises $20M to enable AI assistants to live within messaging apps
items.description: Linq offers an API that lets companies offer their AI assistants via iMessage, RCS and SMS.

items.title: Your Complete Guide to the 2026 Winter Olympics
items.description: From medals to mascots, schedules to slopes—here’s everything you need to know to be ready for the 2026 Winter Olympic Games.

items.title: Coalition demands federal Grok ban over nonconsensual sexual content

items.title: Ring brings its ‘Search Party’ feature for finding lost dogs to non-Ring camera owners
items.description: Ring's Search Party feature for finding lost dogs is now available across the U.S. — even if you don't own a Ring camera.

items.title: 5 Movies You Must Watch Before the 2026 Winter Olympics
items.description: Want to get warmed up to watch a bunch of cold competition? Here are five films you should watch right now, from I, Tonya to Cool Runnings.

items.title: 3 Best Floodlight Security Cameras (2026), Tested and Reviewed
items.description: Light up and secure your driveway, backyard, or porch with a floodlight security camera.

items.title: ICE and Qatari Security Forces at the Winter Olympics Put Italians on Edge
items.description: The influx of security personnel from around the world is sparking concern among Italians ahead of the Milano Cortina Olympic Games.
